程序包 org.harvey.batis.executor.statement

类 RoutingStatementHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.harvey.batis.executor.statement.RoutingStatementHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    StatementHandler
    public class RoutingStatementHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatementHandler
    依据MappedStatement#getStatementType()的StatementType 路由到合适的StatementHandler
    作者:
    Harvey Blocks

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      RoutingStatementHandler​(Executor executor, MappedStatement ms, java.lang.Object parameter, RowBounds rowBounds, ResultHandler<?> resultHandler, BoundSql boundSql)
      参数将全部用来构造适合的StatementHandler
